title.en: A Prayer to the Glorious Karmapa1

text.en: Embodiment of the compassion of the ocean-like Three Jewels,
Perfect splendour of the blessings of the ocean-like Three Roots,
text.en-trans: tsa sum gyatsö jinlab dzokpé pal

text.en: Sovereign of the activity of ocean-like sources of refuge,
Glorious Karmapa, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: palden karma pa la solwa deb

text.en: Look on me with compassion; inspire my mindstream with your blessings,
text.en-trans: tukjé zik la gonggyü jinlab pob

text.en: Purify all my karma, afflictions, habitual tendencies and obscurations,
text.en-trans: lé nyön bak nyal drib tsok jangwa dang

text.en: And cause to attain me, right here upon this very seat,
text.en-trans: tok drol dünyam chok gi changchub ché

text.en: The great awakening of simultaneous realization and liberation!
text.en-trans: ten tok diru tobpar dzé du sol
